title: The BET Awards, Michael Jackson, Weekend Confessions, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: The BET Awards, Michael Jackson, Weekend Confessions, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The BET Awards had people talking and find out what The Steve Harvey Nation had to say. Michael Jackson's 9th Death Anniversary is today and we have Uncle Steve's throwback interview with The King of Pop. The Nephew wants to hear your Weekend Confessions. Closing Remarks today will be done by The Comedy Amigos.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
